name: Fortune Teller (Pauli Kohberger)
description:
Welcome to the world of Fortune Teller! This is an app that will pull cards from the Major Arcana and tell you how they might affect your situation. 

  • Fortune Teller features three different decks, including the classic Rider-Waite Smith, the older Marseilles, and an exclusive pixel art deck!
  • Three different spread types, including a one-card draw (general purpose), a three-card draw (past, present and future), and a daily draw that will show you your fortune for the day.
